groupage.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when several small CONSIGNMENTs (=quantities of goods) from different exporters that are being sent to the same place are packed and sent together by the FORWARDING AGENT to save costs and reduce charges. These consignments are listed together on one BILL OF LADING
groupage.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The Port of Rotterdam Distriparks offer groupage services and warehousing.
